Name: WEIAN-Hammer
Description: Nearby devices are triggered to perform their function, i.e. open/close unlocked doors, trigger sprinklers, start a camera recording, adjust the AC.  The character can trigger 5 devices as they choose over the next 5 rounds

Name: RCDOvrChrgr
Description: Ond target gets +d6 on all Agility and Strength tests for Knowledge+3 rounds

Name: Nok_Nok
Description: Open a nearby locked door.  Failure may trigger an alarm

Name: False Flagger
Description: Fake an alarm or the location of a triggered alarm.  Any response to a real alarm is delayed by 2d6 minutes

Name: SigilTag
Description: This location and nearby systems are tagged with the character's invisible sigil, enabling them to remotely activate Apps as if they were present.  Only two locations can be tagged at the same time

Name: >eRase
Description: Cut or copy the latest 10 minutes of stored information from any type of recording/surveillance device

Name: De-fenc/der
Description: Take control of a nearby turret, drone, or similar defense system for d6 rounds

Name: Blood Snoot
Description: Tracks down an enemy hacker and deals d4 damage each round until they pass a DR12 Knowledge test or die

Name: PathMapper
Description: Uses nearby sensors, cameras, and public information to created a detailed 3D map of the surrounding ~100m

Name: CTechAttak
Description: d3 nearby cybered targets lose a total of 4d10 HP

Name: beaconworm
Description: Place a tracker into a device or cybertech, enabling the character to track its movements in real-time for the coming d4 weeks

Name: TrolleySkipper
Description: Automated defenses have trouble tracking a person of the character's choice and prioritize other available targets
